Title: Short Beaded Halter Prom Dress

Sizes: 8, 10, 4, 12, 14, 6

Category: cocktail, homecoming, party

Featured-image: 965-black-nude-short-beaded-halter-prom-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: An intricate beading details the high neck sleeveless bodice with lace overlay and an oval cutout in the back. The two piece is a mock with a sheer fabric over the midriff. The sheer overlay skirt is covered with a ruffled tulle. The trim of the midriff is beaded as well. This dress is perfect for any cocktail event or special occasion.
